question: The infamous "Banqiao Dam Failure of 1975" happened in which nation?
explanation: Banqiao Dam Failure of 1975 was one of the greatest man-made catastrophes in world history happened in China. Banqiao Dam was constructed during China's Great Leap Forward period. Typhoon Nina of 1975 destroyed this dam along with sixty-one other dams killing 85,600 to 240,000 people. It was the third-deadliest floods in world history.
